keiser is a fast-paced pro-student college that provides highly educated professors. They work with you to make sure you have all the resources to pass the classes and learn. They provide excellent programs and a flexible schedule.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Victoria from Daytona Beach, FL 05/12/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 6 out of 6 people found this review useful. 2 of 144 Categories Comments Tips for prospective students Anyone who wants to be part of something great should apply and attend Keiser University for the staff will make you feel right at home. Bang for the buck The tuition at Keiser is somewhat expensive but I definitely feel that it will be worth it. Am enjoying being here I believe I will enjoy being a student at this university. I feel honored that they have accepted me to be apart of their family.
